name: Isabelle Brightman
biography: Isabelle and husband Chris Brightman have designed for decades. From 1981 to 1991, they designed and produced jewelry clocks, lights, and small furniture from anodized aluminum. Isabelle was born in Belgium and came to the United States in 1979. Since then, she has designed objects and produced film animation, and in 2006, she founded a lighting design and décor showroom in Santa Cruz, CA.
